channel.title: Bugged items on my server
channel.description:
[b]On my server when i wield my armours and stuff they wield as the weapon and when i click on the swords where you can do spec it says non exsisting item can anyone fix it for me or help? plox
thanks, TehPure[/b] ;)

I cant change the non exsisting name nor do the thing you said about item.java would it be easier if u had msn so you could talk to me and explain a little more my msn is miniaddy@hotmail.co.uk please add me

item.title: Bugged items on my server
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

This part may seem pretty complicated to do, but it is pretty simple. Since Siccc already told you how to change the “NON EXISTING ITEM” problem, I will tell you how to make them wield in the proper places.

First, check the item IDs of the codes that are going into the weapon slot, and then go into Item.Java, and add it to the appropriate area. To do this, search public static int and then what you want. If you are trying to add a cape to the cape slot, take the cape ID, and search public static int capes and you will see a lot of IDs, add it to the end, and Save+Compile.

If you still don’t understand, here is what to do in simple.

This is what the public static int capes looks like, at the end of the numbers on mine where it says 7685, add a comma after that, and add the ID. Then Save+Compile.

public static int capes[] = { 2677,2680,2683,2686,2689,2692,2695,2698,2701,2704,2710,2713,2716,2719,2722,2725,2728,2731,2734,2737,10943, 10944, 10945, 10946, 10865, 10866, 11371, 11372, 10412, 10704, 10705, 10707, 10708, 10710, 10711, 10713, 10714, 10716, 10717, 10719, 10720, 10722, 10723, 10725, 10726, 10728, 10729, 10731, 10732, 10734, 10735, 10737, 10738, 10740, 10741, 10743, 10744, 10746, 10747, 10749, 10750, 10752, 10753, 10755, 10756, 10758, 10759, 10761, 10762, 10764, 10765, 10767, 10768, 10770, 11192, 11193, 11194, 7535, 6111, 6570, 6568, 1007, 1019, 1021, 1023, 1027, 1029, 1031, 1052, 2412, 2413, 2414, 4304, 4315, 4317, 4319, 4321, 4323, 4325, 4327, 4329, 4331, 4333, 4335, 4337, 4339, 4341, 4343, 4345, 4347, 4349, 4351, 4353, 4355, 4357, 4359, 4361, 4363, 4365, 4367, 4369, 4371, 4373, 4375, 4377, 4379, 4381, 4383, 4385, 4387, 4389, 4391, 4393, 4395, 4397, 4399, 4401, 4403, 4405, 4407, 4409, 4411, 4413, 4514, 4516, 6070, 6568, 6570, 3777, 3790, 3783, 2413, 3789, 3781, 3763, 3765, 3787, 3785, 4304, 3779, 3759,3761, 762, 7623, 7626, 7630, 7632, 7634, 7636, 7638, 7640, 7648, 7628, 750, 7653, 7655, 7650, 7657, 7672, 7674, 7676, 7678, 7680, 7682, 7685 };

Read full topic

item.title: Bugged items on my server
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

The part where it says non existing item is because you don’t have the item in item.cfg. Just put the item id name and its stats in there and it should work. Use the other items in there as a guide. Also just a note the first 3 numbers are shop prices. And stuff.

Read full topic
